channel.title: Error when I try to run Aryan
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bot Press any key to continue . . .
What do I do when I get this as an error when i run run-bot?

item.title: Error when I try to run Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Loz Loz
item.description:
@Loz wrote:

click the compile-all.bat file in the Aryan folder.

item.title: Error when I try to run Aryan
item.dc:creator: @sk8nguitar sk8nguitar
item.description:
@sk8nguitar wrote:

Note: .\..\OUTPUT\sign\signlink.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

bryant to fix that problem:

[quote=“sk8nguitar, post:166, topic:1510”][quote author=edycus link=topic=1529.msg18755#msg18755 date=1146003656]
I got a new error with the last update. I get this when I try start run-bot.bat

[06:22:23] Starting Aryan © http://wasteofmoney.org 2006 - RegeX, pd, Sean & e
Xemplar
[06:22:23] This application is licensed under the GNU GPL. See COPYING for more
details
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sign/signlink
at Bot.(Bot.java:121)
at Bot.main(Bot.java:92)
Press any key to continue . . .

Any ideas?
[/quote]

I had the same problem earlier, just go in the Output folder and then into the “sign” folder and compile “signlink.java” for some reason it didnt compile it when i ran the updater but anyway to do that just make a simple bat program in the sign folder and run it. like…

@echo off title Compiling echo Compiling - please wait... javac signlink.java pause

save it as compile.bat and run it and then go and try to run aryan again and it should work :P[/quote]

That should work

Read full topic

item.title: Error when I try to run Aryan
item.dc:creator: @bryant bryant
item.description:
@bryant wrote:

Im sry for posting it here but when I try to compile I get more errors like 3 of them and I am not sure where to search under forums for help.

The errors I got when i tried to compile:

AccessorMethods.java:2397: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable anInt950
location: class AccessorMethods
boolean canWalk = rs.doWalkTo(y - rs.baseY, 2, false, 0,
myPlayer().entBigX[0], 1, anInt950, 0, 0, x - rs.baseX, myPlayer().entBigY[0],
1);

                       ^

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
…\BotClasses\AccessorMethods.java:2397: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable anInt950
location: class AccessorMethods
boolean canWalk = rs.doWalkTo(y - rs.baseY, 2, false, 0,
myPlayer().entBigX[0], 1, anInt950, 0, 0, x - rs.baseX, myPlayer().entBigY[0],
1);

                       ^

Note: …\OUTPUT\sign\signlink.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
…\BotClasses\AccessorMethods.java:2397: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable anInt950
location: class AccessorMethods
boolean canWalk = rs.doWalkTo(y - rs.baseY, 2, false, 0,
myPlayer().entBigX[0], 1, anInt950, 0, 0, x - rs.baseX, myPlayer().entBigY[0],
1);

                       ^

Note: …\OUTPUT\sign\signlink.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
